General.Name: Mos obl sb
General.Description: Public Joint-Stock Company Rosseti Moscow Region, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the transmission of electricity through electrical networks primarily in Russia. It also installs, repairs, and maintains electrical equipment; and offers technical connection services. The company was formerly known as Public Joint Stock Company "Moscow United Electric Grid Company" and changed its name to Public Joint Stock Company "Rosseti Moscow Region" in July 2020. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Moscow, Russia. Public Joint-Stock Company Rosseti Moscow Region is a subsidiary of Rosseti, Public Joint Stock Company.
